text: Santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmino sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karissanti evarūpāpi bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe
edit: Santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmino sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karissanti – evarūpāpi bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe

translations.transtext: Monks, there are monks in this group, [who are] those destroying the [lower] three fetters of rebirth, those having the weakening of lust, anger, and delusion, those coming once---having come to this world only once, they will make the end of suffering. Monks, there are such monks also in this group.
